attributes.action: Legislate educational establishments to prepare and maintain emergency plans, and to ensure all staff within these sites are sufficiently trained to perform their role.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Educational establishments are required to ensure the Health & Safety of their staff and students under the Health & Safety Act 1974. In addition to the fire and evacuation plans, further preparations are necessary to ensure resilience within educational establishments. There is no specification the requirement for emergency plans. Legislation and relevant audit to ensure the safety and security of students is required.
